mapper.select: select p.id, n.name as groupName, p.path as projectPath, sum(t1.commit_count) as commitCount from push_event_payloads t1 left join events e on t1.event_id = e.id left join projects p on e.project_id = p.id left join namespaces n on n.id = p.namespace_id where e.action = 5 and e.updated_at between '${beginDate}' and '${endDate}' group by p.id, n.name, p.name;

select p.id as projectId, n.name as groupName, p.path as projectPath, u.name as userName, sum(t1.commit_count) as commitCount from push_event_payloads t1 left join events e on t1.event_id = e.id left join projects p on e.project_id = p.id left join namespaces n on n.id = p.namespace_id left join users u on u.id = e.author_id where e.action = 5 and e.updated_at between '${beginDate}' and '${endDate}' group by p.id, n.name, p.name, u.name;
